content.xhtml:p: Since december 2005 I work for DadaMobile as a full-time employee.
I am still willing to accept short-term non-full-time assignments. You can find here my Curriculum Vitae (Italian version).

I work in IT as a developer. In my free time (which is becoming less and less...) I participate to various Open Source projects.
